title: Sketch Class: In the Shadows
short_description: This program is currently sold out. To be added onto the waiting list, please email museum-programs@artic.edu.
header_description: This program is currently sold out. To be added onto the waiting list, please email museum-programs@artic.edu.
list_description: This program is currently sold out. To be added onto the waiting list, please email museum-programs@artic.edu.
description:
Six Thursdays
May 2–June 6
5:30–7:30

This class is for people ages 16 and up.

Embrace the use of black as you work with darks and lights to develop shadows, deep space, and emotion in your sketches. Learn about shading, the value scale, and the power of contrast to create drama in drawings using a variety of media. 

Multi-session sketch classes offer the chance to draw in the museum's galleries under the guidance of experienced instructors. All materials will be provided. 

Click here to see all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an e-mail to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
